blogPost.title: How did the Romans pump water for their aqueducts? Answer by Astrid Ingmarsdottir. https://t.co/lI2bDK3W7W https://t.co/ttTRDwug3j
blogPost.author: Quora

localize.full_text: 罗马人是如何为他们的输水管道抽水的？由Astrid Ingmarsdottir回答。https://t.co/lI2bDK3W7W https://t.co/ttTRDwug3j。
羅馬人是如何爲他們的輸水管道抽水的？由Astrid Ingmarsdottir回答。https://t.co/lI2bDK3W7W https://t.co/ttTRDwug3j。
ローマ人はどのようにして水道橋の水を汲み上げたのでしょうか？回答者：Astrid Ingmarsdottirさん https://t.co/lI2bDK3W7W https://t.co/ttTRDwug3j

previous.title: How did the reconstruction era leave a lasting impression on modern American history? Answer by @history_buff_, Pulitzer Prize-winning historian, author. https://t.co/OhjbToW6Fi https://t.co/47N3Q4rDfY

localize.full_text: 重建时代是如何给美国现代史留下深刻印象的？由普利策奖得主、作家@history_buff_回答。https://t.co/OhjbToW6Fi https://t.co/47N3Q4rDfY。
重建時代是如何給美國現代史留下深刻印象的？由普利策獎得主、作家@history_buff_回答。https://t.co/OhjbToW6Fi https://t.co/47N3Q4rDfY。
復興期はアメリカの近代史にどのような影響を与えたのでしょうか？回答者：@history_buff_（ピューリッツァー賞受賞の歴史家、作家） https://t.co/OhjbToW6Fi https://t.co/47N3Q4rDfY

next.title: How did New York City create the world's best drinking water? Answer by @LawHeller, Professor @ColumbiaLaw. https://t.co/ZaT4Qh8yCv https://t.co/XKn3UlN5yE
